front.title: Exising Practices for Smooth Key Rollover with Interior Routing Protocols

abstract.t: This document describes some existing deployed operationalpractices that are in use to provide smooth key rollover for IETFinterior routing protocols (e.g. IS-IS, OSPFv2, RIPv2). This isintended for eventual publication as an Informational RFC on theIndependent Submission track, not via the IETF track.
